full_summary:
# Infratsructure Contract Award Notice
Government Procurement Notice: Request for Proposal
 solicitation: WS3744824114 - Spectrograph and Streak Camera Imager System

## Background and Context
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) acting as the Contracting Authority has released a request for proposals for the supply and delivery of a Spectrograph and high dynamic range electronic Streak Camera Imager System.

## Requirement Overview
The Department of National Defence (DND) DRDC Suffield Research Centre has a requirement for a Spectrograph and high dynamic range electronic Streak Camera Imager System to perform time resolved spectroscopy for single shot events in the ultraviolet to visible spectral range.

## Contracting Entity
The Contracting Entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and the End User is the Department of National Defence (DND).

## Tender Details
* Reference Number: WS3744824114
* Solicitation Number: WS3744824114
* Tender Title: Spectrograph and Streak Camera Imager System
* Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)
* Tender Status Date: 2023-10-12T14:00:00
* Amendment Number: 1
* Amendment Date: 2023-09-22
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-10-12T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-10-13
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-02-12
* Regions of Delivery: *Alberta

## Requirements and Description
Bidders are required to submit their offers electronically via Ariba Discovery.
All bidders are subject to the terms and conditions of the procurement.
Bidders are required to comply with the requirements outlined in the business proposal instructions.
The Department of National Defence (DND) and PSPC reserve the right to adjust the contract terms and conditions.

## Important Notes

- Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time.
- All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by 2023-10-12T14:00:00.
- All bids submitted after the aforementioned date will be declared non-responsive.

Contact:
Oana (SPAC/PSPC) - elle-la / she-her
oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Disclaimer**
The PSPC tenders listed are from the Directive on Open Government. Defence sectoral
